mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (member, rent, startDate, endDate, guestCount, totalPrice, merchant_uid) VALUES (#{member}, #{rent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{guestCount}, #{totalPrice}, #{merchant_uid})
mapper.select: SELECT reservation.*, member.userName, member.phoneNum, rent.title FROM reservation JOIN member ON member.idx = reservation.member JOIN rent ON rent.idx = reservation.rent WHERE rent = #{rent} ORDER BY startDate
SELECT startDate, endDate FROM reservation WHERE rent = #{rent} ORDER BY idx
SELECT reservation.*, rent.title, rent.contactNum AS phoneNum FROM reservation JOIN rent ON rent.idx = reservation.rent WHERE reservation.member = #{member}
